title: About the free mystery champion
body: So I just did the Facebook connect thing to get a free mystery champion, will I still get one if the only champion I don't own is Bard? Because on the mystery gifting FAQ it says you need more than 10 unowned champs to be able to get one, will I just not get a mystery champion or will I get something else instead? thanks :)

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Ziggles,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=UGGVKfuU,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-06-21T08:34:46.875+0000)
>
> So I just did the Facebook connect thing to get a free mystery champion, will I still get one if the only champion I don't own is Bard? Because on the mystery gifting FAQ it says you need more than 10 unowned champs to be able to get one, will I just not get a mystery champion or will I get something else instead? thanks :)

If you dont get a mystery champion, you get a mystery skin. Go figure. (its in the FAQ..)

It's probably just going to attempt to give you a free champion, but then fail because you aren't in acceptable condition for it. You might want to contact a red to see if they can give you compensation, but the conditions exist there for a reason.
